page.title: 14Some school clubs.
page.content:
Church Hill Junior School, Thurmaston has many clubs. This is what some Third year children say about them:
We do{gardening}on Tuesday and Thurs day afternoons. A mother comes in to help us. She has 4 children at a time. We planted crocus bulbs in the greenhouse; weeded our school garden; planted some seeds early in the cold- frame and then planted flowers and vegetables in the garden. We grew beans, peas, lettuce, potatoes, cress, onions, carrots, petunias, candytuft and geraniums. On Monday and Wednesday we have a { {recorder}group. I have a descant and treble recoder. Some others play tenor recorder. There are beginners, middle and top groups meeting in different rooms.
